H0.text: the temperature of gas is proportional to the. Pressure

H1.text: the temperature of gas is proportional to the. Density

H2.text: the temperature of gas is proportional to the. Mass

H3.text: the temperature of gas is proportional to the. volume

A6.text: An alternative statistical mechanics derivation of the ideal-gas law, using the relationship between the Helmholtz free energy and the partition function, is provided.
